description: The classic cargo pant gets a modern Polo upgrade with extra stretch, a drawstring waist, and a trim silhouette.
fitting_details: Stretch Slim Fit: sits low at the waist. Slim through the leg.
Size 46W has an 11½" rise and a 16¾" leg opening.
Belt loops. Elastic drawstring waistband. Zip fly with a snapped closure.
Two front angled pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Two back snapped pockets. Cargo pocket at each leg.
Signature embroidered Pony above the back right pocket.
product: Stretch Slim Fit Camo Chino Cargo Pant
